Package monster

Class shadowStandar

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
monster.shadowStandar
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class shadowStandar extends Entity
Represents a standard shadow monster in the game.

    • shadowStandar

      public shadowStandar(GamePanel gp, monsterData data)
      Constructs a shadow standard monster with data from the provided monster data.
      Parameters:
      gp - The GamePanel instance.
      data - The monster data used for initialization.

  • Method Details

    • getAttackType

      public String getAttackType()
      Gets the type of attack used by the monster.
      Returns:
      The attack type.

    • getPhysAttack

      public int getPhysAttack(int playerEndurance, int attackerStat)
      Calculates the physical attack damage based on player endurance and attacker's stat.
      Parameters:
      playerEndurance - Player's endurance stat.
      attackerStat - Attacker's stat.
      Returns:
      The calculated physical attack damage.

    • levelUp

      public void levelUp()
      Increases the level of the shadowStandar instance and allocates a random number of points to its stats upon leveling up. The total number of points distributed is fixed at 3, and they are randomly assigned to the available stats (hp, str, agi, mag). The distribution ensures that each stat receives at least 1 point.
      See Also:
      • Random

    • getCombatImage

      public BufferedImage getCombatImage()
      Gets the combat image of the monster.
      Returns:
      The combat image.

    • getImage

      public void getImage()
      Loads images for different walking directions.

    • swaptoBossImage

      public void swaptoBossImage()
      Swaps the entity's sprites to a boss image with a specified size. The entity's movement sprites (walk) in all directions are set to the boss image with the given size. The solid area dimensions are adjusted accordingly, and the entity is marked as a boss.

    • setAction

      public void setAction()
      Sets the action for the monster (basic random movement).
      Overrides:
      setAction in class Entity

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the state of the monster, including collision with the player, checking the distance to the player, and managing the monster's path.
      Overrides:
      update in class Entity

    • swapStats

      public void swapStats(int level, int exp, int nextLevelExp, int life, int maxLife, int mana, int maxMana, int strength, int agility, int magic, int vitality)
      Swaps the stats of the entity with the provided values.
      Parameters:
      level - The new level for the entity.
      exp - The new experience points for the entity.
      nextLevelExp - The experience points required for the next level.
      life - The new current life points (HP) for the entity.
      maxLife - The new maximum life points (HP) for the entity.
      mana - The new current mana points (MP) for the entity.
      maxMana - The new maximum mana points (MP) for the entity.
      strength - The new strength stat for the entity.
      agility - The new agility stat for the entity.
      magic - The new magic stat for the entity.
      vitality - The new vitality stat for the entity.
